dcterms:creator: S. P. Mohanty
dcterms:description: The CrowdAI Mapping Challenge dataset consists of over 280k satellite images of size 300 × 300 pixels for training and 60k images for testing, providing polygon annotations in MS COCO format.
dcterms:title: CrowdAI Mapping Challenge dataset

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Dollár
C Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: MS COCO is a large-scale dataset that contains images with object instances annotated in context, widely used for various computer vision tasks.
dcterms:title: MS COCO

dcterms:creator: Emmanuel Maggiori
Yuliya Tarabalka
Guillaume Charpiat
Pierre Alliez
dcterms:description: The Inria segmentation dataset is designed for semantic labeling of aerial images, providing a benchmark for evaluating segmentation methods across various urban environments.
dcterms:title: Inria segmentation dataset
